lead_paragraph: Four-times Olympic champion Laura Kenny said she will always be grateful to former British Cycling technical director Shane Sutton but could not condone the behaviour that forced him to quit 100 days before the Rio Games.

headline.print_headline: Kenny Praises Sutton, but Says Cannot Condone Behaviour
headline.main: Kenny Praises Sutton, but Says Cannot Condone Behaviour

snippet: Four-times Olympic champion Laura Kenny said she will always be grateful to former British Cycling technical director Shane Sutton but could not condone the behaviour that forced him to quit 100 days before the Rio Games....
